p: The observed cardiovascular benefits of MC outlined here in this case support current trends in the literature, that is, cell culture, [ 5] systematic reviews, [ 6] receptor cloning, and agonist/antagonist studies. [ 7– 9] The case also supports the hypothesis that components of cannabis appear to be cardioprotective, [ 4– 9] operating via a vast distribution of the ECS and noncannabinoid secondary messenger systems.
